sqlMap.select: SELECT #itemId# "itemId", #userId# "userId", 'Y' "isAuth" FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT schedule_id FROM ikep4_sd_schedule WHERE schedule_id = #itemId# AND SCHEDULE_PUBLIC = 0 ) OR EXISTS (SELECT a.schedule_id FROM ikep4_sd_schedule a LEFT JOIN ikep4_sd_participant b ON (b.schedule_id = a.schedule_id) WHERE a.schedule_id = #itemId# AND SCHEDULE_PUBLIC = 1 AND #userId# IN (a.register_id, b.target_user_id) AND rownum <= 1 )

SELECT ITEM.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID ITEM.REGISTER_ID AS USER_ID FROM IKEP4_SB_BD_ITEM ITEM WHERE
ITEM.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
ITEM.READ_PERMISSION = 0

SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.checkMicroBlog */ COUNT (A.AUTH) FROM ( SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID AS AUTH FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog WHERE mblog.MBLOG_ID = #itemId# AND (mblog.MBGROUP_ID IS NULL OR LENGTH (mblog.MBGROUP_ID) = 0)
UNION
SELECT mblog.MBLOG_ID AS AUTH FROM IKEP4_MB_MBLOG mblog, IKEP4_MB_MBGROUP_MEMBER mbgroupMember WHERE mblog.MBLOG_ID = #itemId# AND mblog.MBGROUP_ID = mbgroupmember.MBGROUP_ID AND mbgroupMember.MEMBER_ID = #userId# AND mbgroupmember.STATUS = '1'
UNION
SELECT mbgroup.MBGROUP_ID AS AUTH FROM IKEP4_MB_MBGROUP mbgroup WHERE mbgroup.MBGROUP_ID = #itemId# ) A

SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] FileCheck.checkTodo */ COUNT(1) FROM IKEP4_TD_TASK A, IKEP4_TD_TASK_USER B WHERE A.TASK_ID = SUBSTR(#itemId#, 1, DECODE(INSTR(#itemId#, '_')-1, -1, LENGTH(#itemId#), INSTR(#itemId#, '_')-1) ) AND A.TASK_ID = B.TASK_ID AND (A.DIRECTOR_ID = #userId# OR B.WORKER_ID = #userId#)

SELECT COUNT(*) /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.checkMessage */ FROM IKEP4_ME_MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_ID IN ( SELECT MESSAGE_ID FROM IKEP4_ME_SENDBOX WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #itemId# AND USER_ID = #userId# UNION ALL SELECT MESSAGE_ID FROM IKEP4_ME_STOREBOX WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #itemId# AND USER_ID = #userId# UNION ALL SELECT MESSAGE_ID FROM IKEP4_ME_RECEIVEBOX WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #itemId# AND USER_ID IN (SELECT group_id FROM IKEP4_EV_GROUP START WITH GROUP_ID IN ( SELECT A.GROUP_ID FROM IKEP4_EV_GROUP A, IKEP4_EV_USER_GROUP B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID AND A.GROUP_TYPE_ID = 'G0001' AND B.USER_ID = #userId# )CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_GROUP_ID = GROUP_ID UNION SELECT #userId# FROM DUAL) )

SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.checkWorkspaceBoard */ COUNT(PERM) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = 0 THEN CASE WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = 1 THEN CASE WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END PERM FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM A INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD B ON (A.BOARD_ID=B.BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_MEMBER C ON (B.WORKSPACE_ID=C.WORKSPACE_ID AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') AND C.MEMBER_ID=#userId#) WHERE A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN A.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = 0 THEN CASE WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN A.READ_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN A.FOLLOW_BOARD_PERMISSION = 1 THEN CASE WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN B.READ_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='1' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='2' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='4' THEN 1 WHEN B.WRITE_PERMISSION='3' AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL <='3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END PERM FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM A INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_BOARD B ON (A.BOARD_ID=B.BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_MEMBER C ON (B.WORKSPACE_ID=C.WORKSPACE_ID AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') AND C.MEMBER_ID=#userId#) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_ITEM_VERSION D ON (A.ITEM_ID=D.ITEM_ID AND D.VERSION_ID= #itemId#) WHERE B.VERSION_MANAGE=1 )

SELECT /* [FILECHECK_SQLMAP.XML] filecheck.checkWorkspaceWeekly */ COUNT(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(A.ITEM_ID) AS CNT FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_WEEKLY A INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_MEMBER B ON (B.WORKSPACE_ID=A.WORKSPACE_ID AND B.MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') AND B.MEMBER_ID=#userId#) WHERE A.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND A.IS_SUMMARY=0
UNION ALL
SELECT COUNT(A.ITEM_ID) AS CNT FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_WEEKLY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT G.GROUP_ID, G.PARENT_GROUP_ID , W.WORKSPACE_ID FROM IKEP4_WS_WORKSPACE W INNER JOIN IKEP4_EV_GROUP G ON (W.TEAM_ID= G.GROUP_ID AND G.GROUP_TYPE_ID='G0001') ) B ON (A.WORKSPACE_ID=B.WORKSPACE_ID) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_WORKSPACE C ON (C.TEAM_ID=B.PARENT_GROUP_ID) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_MEMBER D ON (D.WORKSPACE_ID=C.WORKSPACE_ID AND D.MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') AND D.MEMBER_ID=#userId#) WHERE A.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND A.IS_SUMMARY=1 )

SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.checkWorkspaceAnnounce */ COUNT(A.ITEM_ID) FROM IKEP4_WS_BD_ANNOUNCE A INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_BD_ANNOUNCE_WORKSPACE B ON (A.ITEM_ID=B.ITEM_ID) INNER JOIN IKEP4_WS_MEMBER C ON (C.WORKSPACE_ID=B.WORKSPACE_ID AND C.MEMBER_LEVEL IN ('1','2','3','4') AND C.MEMBER_ID=#userId#) WHERE A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.getBoardId */ BOARD_ID FROM IKEP4_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
SELECT /* [FileCheck_SqlMap.xml] filecheck.getItemAuthor */ REGISTER_ID FROM IKEP4_BD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
